name: Terminal Velocity (DEMO)
description:
In Terminal Velocity, you have been dispatched to handle a rogue bullet train that has been overrun by rampant, zombie-like robots. Utilizing the minimal light and resources at your disposal, can you make your way to the controls, bring the vehicle to a stop and ultimately escape with your life?

CORE MECHANICS:

Fight, sneak or run through randomly-seeded train cars, each filled with ambling, robotic menaces, to advance to the front of the train. Neon lights will be your ally - whether it be through muzzle flashes, thrown flares or brief illuminations from passing lights, you must improvise to see your enemy. To further complicate matters, you have limited ammunition and time… carelessly firing into the darkness will bite you, so make every shot count!

Along the way, you will find Health Packs, Flares and Ammo Boxes that will make your life a little easier.

SELLING POINTS:

Terminal Velocity is a game that builds its challenge around a unique aesthetic presentation. Minimalistic visuals, bolstered by scenic lighting and an adaptive soundtrack, provide an experience that requires attentiveness and quick reflexes. Its replayability and mechanical appeal extends off of its core gameplay and randomly-generated runs.
